item.title: Aromatique Balance : Fork-it Hackathon 2nd Runner Up
item.description: Aromatique Balance Team Team Name: Cryptonyts Team Leader Namer: Kushagra Singh Email Id: contact@kushagrasingh.co Kushagra Satyam Joysa Nishita Check out Website!: Project Repository https://github.com/kushagra-singhh/AromatiqueBalance Presentation Aromatique Balance by Cryptonyts Description AromatiqueBalance is a Flask web application designed to help users overcome various mental issues through aromatherapy. This app utilizes the power of Flask, a lightweight Python web framework, to provide an intuitive and user-friendly interface for accessing aromatherapy suggestions. Technologies Used Flask Python FlavorDB API HTML/CSS Features Mental Issue Identification: Users can input their mental health concerns or issues into the app.
